column3:
“White Haze is a pretty light smoke. The taste is kinda pine and earthy, with a nice addition of lemon flavor. something I prefer a lot.

At first comes a nice and warm body-buzz, followed by an euphoric head-high. The mind stays also focused and feels more awake.


The chilled body-buzz together with the focused and happy head-high make it a good Netflix or Chill After Workout - Strain.
Overall the effects of White H...”

“A friend recently got hold of some of this and so let me sample a bit. The nugs appeared dense with an ice like crystal coating, similar to that of frozen lawn dew. When ignited, I got a taste, sort of like an earthy taste but could taste more of something which reminded me of stone.  It was also quite smooth to say it was a sativa.  Unfortunately can't give a verdict of the after effects as I smoked another strain a...”
“Definitely recommend for a daytime high”
“White and crystals, oh my!! Smells sweet and sour. Four stars for the level of high. Just felt it should have matched the amazing look and smell.”
“This is my favourite everyday strain. makes me feel happy, relaxed, focused and takes away any head pain”

“Delicious fresh pine and lemon taste, like the best of PineSol and Mr. Clean rolled up into one.

Buzz is light and update. Very sativa-like. Like others have said, it is not overwhelmingly powerful, but I actually kind of like that. A nice, clean daytime-friendly buzz that goes well with pretty much any activity. Personally, I found the burnout to be a bit much, but this seems to be common with me and sativas.”
“I love the citrus/pine flavours of this strain. Made me feel warm and euphoric, a great daytime smoke!”

“One of the best sativas I've had the chance to inhale! I had me dancing and laughing hours and hours! Kinda rough when smoked, but excellent taste when vaped. One of the most thc-full bud I've had in a while.”
“this sativa strain is perfect for doing and also finishing activities or just stuff that needs done! one of my favs. :)”

“This is a bad-ass strain that is perfect work lighting up on the way to work! Incredibly focused, and clear. I have on many occasions lit up, and helped customers with ease, and focus, and a sense of happiness. Perfect daytime medication, and perfect for depression.”

“Delicious fresh pine and lemon taste, like the best of PineSol and Mr. Clean rolled up into one.

Buzz is light and update. Very sativa-like. Like others have said, it is not overwhelmingly powerful, but I actually kind of like that. A nice, clean daytime-friendly buzz that goes well with pretty much any activity. Personally, I found the burnout to be a bit much, but this seems to be common with me and sativas.”
“This is one of the better strains I have had , nice kick to lift you up , strong flower. Only has a little bit of that deisely taste more earthy . Smooth .”
“I absolutely love this strain!!! It's a nice uplifting buzz. Also very relaxing. I would most definitely use it again and recommend it to others!”
“Hit me nicely in a social space with the focus to moderate the nice cerebral high.”

“Good but not as good as say Green Cracker Jack.
Then again i do prefer Indicas anyway.
Still a good strain, just not as good as for the $18.00 a gram price tag.”
“One of my favorite sativas too. Tastes super well giving you a great feeling while smoking. On the other hand, it is not as strong as a imagined.”

“As a lover of anything haze crossed, I was excited to try this white haze. This bud has a lemon yet piney flavour and gives off a light buzz that relaxed my whole body, melting away my stiffness and muscle spasms.   I loved the body and mind high that comes with this strain, but did find the come down rather difficult 2 hours after smoking it.   Not a morning strain for me, but great for daytime use if you dont have ...”
“smooth & moderate haze time”

“I personally am not a fan of this strain. It's just not enough bang for the buck you put in. At $20 a gram it's definitely not worth it. It's a mediocre head buzz for such an expensive Sativa. The high is pretty weak, and the you're back to earth in a quick hour or two. I don't recommend it unless you got some cash to spend. It helped my focusing issues of my ADHD, but wore off too quickly. It made me sleepy, which I...”
“nice strain thats smooth,light and smells good.”
“Hooopi fucking konyo, kita rumannnn”
